Description: Heat & Hot Water Included Laundry in building Hardwood floors Dishwasher Gas Stove A/C No Undergrads Charming and sunny upper floor one bedroom in the heart of Brighton Center. Walking distance to The Boston Landing neighborhood, commuter rail station and the Charles River. No Pets Allowed (RLNE8191525)
